name: 0x06-starwars_api
description: -   Allowed editors:  `vi`,  `vim`,  `emacs` -   All your files will be interpreted on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS using  `node`  (version 10.14.x) -   All your files should end with a new line -   The first line of all your files should be exactly  `#!/usr/bin/node` -   A  `README.md`  file, at the root of the folder of the project, is mandatory -   Your code should be  `semistandard`  compliant.  [Rules of Standard](https://intranet.alxswe.com/rltoken/9P3gH5mVdJCEKL87E-IMaA "Rules of Standard")  +  [semicolons on top](https://intranet.alxswe.com/rltoken/WjMvQfBMKBdsNUuHyg55Dw "semicolons on top"). Also as reference:  [AirBnB style](https://intranet.alxswe.com/rltoken/Xp81RT-Sfi7uE_kNCSXunw "AirBnB style") -   All your files must be executable -   The length of your files will be tested using  `wc` -   You are not allowed to use  `var`
